scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a male figure, likely Christ, crucified on a cross. He wears a red robe and has a halo. His hands and feet are pierced by nails, with blood visible. The background is a rich blue tapestry with gold geometric patterns and stylized motifs. To the left and right of the figure are architectural elements that appear to be parts of a larger structure, possibly representing a symbolic or heavenly setting. A shield with heraldic symbols is placed at the base of the cross.
